content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #273

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 67

Submitted by @bvdh from Philips Healthcare

Chapter: Hooks
Section: Hooks Definition Format
Type: NEG :exclamation:
In Person Requested? Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Existing Wording:

Hook creators MAY choose to name their hook with a URI (e.g. https://example.org/hooks/patient-transmogrify) if the hook is specific to an organization.
When naming hooks, the name should start with the subject (noun) of the hook and be followed by the activity (verb). For example, patient-view (not view-patient) or medication-prescribe (not prescribe-medication).

Comment:
Why not mandate this? The common hooks could be labeled with the hl7 url: e.g. www.hl7.org/patient-view

## Triage Information

Triage Notes:
Reviewed with Bas

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Duplicate of ballot comment 129 from Guilherme

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
Duplicate of ballot comment 129 from Guilherme

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:
